wordpressPage.title: Balloon-String Stomping
wordpressPage.content:
• Give each young person a balloon and a piece of string.
  • Get them to inflate their balloon and tie it to the piece of string
  • Get them to tie the other end of the string to their ankle
  • When the game starts the aim of the game is to be the last person with a balloon. Everyone tries to stomp on everyone else’s balloon.
  • Once a young person’s balloon is popped they are out.
  • The winner is the last young person with a balloon
